blogPost.excerpt: A very simple font game for designers. Inspired by https://cantunsee.space/ 🐛 This is the beta version. Any suggestions are welcome like bugs, feedback, domain name, etc.
blogPost.body: A very simple font game for designers. Inspired by https://cantunsee.space/ 🐛 This is the beta version. Any suggestions are welcome like bugs, feedback, domain name, etc.
blogPost.title: Foont - A game for designers to identify fonts
blogPost.author: Berkay🥤

localize.description: 一个非常简单的设计师的字体游戏。灵感来自https://cantunsee.space/ 🐛 这是测试版。欢迎提出任何建议，如bug、反馈、域名等。
localize.tagline: 设计师识别字体的游戏

localize.description: 一個非常簡單的設計師的字體遊戲。靈感來自https://cantunsee.space/ 🐛 這是測試版。歡迎提出任何建議，如bug、反饋、域名等。
localize.tagline: 設計師識別字體的遊戲

previous.excerpt: enjoy flying drones with spotfindr 🔎 find amazing spots all over the world 🚦 get drone regulations for every spot ☁️ live weather data for every spot 📍 get drone regulations for your current location
previous.title: spotfindr 2.0 - Discover thousands of amazing drone spots around the globe

localize.description: 享受飞行无人机与spotfindr 🔎发现世界各地的惊人地点🚦获得每个地点的无人机规定☁️每个地点的实时天气数据📍获得你当前位置的无人机规定。
localize.tagline: 发现全球数千处令人惊叹的无人机景点

localize.description: 享受飛行無人機與spotfindr 🔎發現世界各地的驚人地點🚦獲得每個地點的無人機規定☁️每個地點的實時天氣數據📍獲得你當前位置的無人機規定。
localize.tagline: 發現全球數千處令人驚歎的無人機景點
